message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I think this is a generous offer considering I'm the one making the first move.
Your split seems heavily skewed in your favor, especially considering the inflation. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. Take it or watch your share dwindle.
Considering the inflation, my share is worth less now. I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. Let's do 58-42 and call it a day.

Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Your offers have been unreasonable from the start. I'm offering a 52/48 split, which is more than fair considering the shrinking pot. Take it before inflation eats away at your potential gains even further.
